auction.json

Class AuctionJSONConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • auction.json.AuctionJSONConverter

  • public class AuctionJSONConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for converting between raw JSON (in string form) and auction data. The basic format of a JSON Auction is: 
     {
  "id": {id},
  "seller_id": {sellerID},
  "end_date": {endDate},
  "starting_price": {startingPrice},
  "reserve_price": {reservePrice},
  "item":
    {"id": {id},
           "name": {name},
           "desc": {description}}
 }

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public java.lang.String serialize(AuctionJSONWrapper auction)
        Takes the input auction info and outputs a JSON string representation of it
        Parameters:
        auction - the auction data to serialize
        Returns:
        a JSON string representing that auction, or null if an error occurred.

      • serialize

        public java.lang.String serialize(AuctionListJSONWrapper auctions)
        Serializes data on multiple auctions. The output is returned as a JSON object with an auctions array containing the individual auction objects.
        Parameters:
        auctions - the auctions to serialize
        Returns:
        a JSON string representing that set of auctions, or null if an error occurred.

      • deserializeAuction

        public AuctionJSONWrapper deserializeAuction(java.lang.String json)
        Deserializes a JSON string into auction data for a single auction.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON to parse
        Returns:
        an AuctionJSONWrapper with the deserialized data.

      • deserializeAuctions

        public AuctionListJSONWrapper deserializeAuctions(java.lang.String json)
        Deserializes a JSON string into auction data for multiple auctions.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON to parse
        Returns:
        an AuctionListJSONWrapper containing the data for all of the objects in the given JSON string.
